name: Top Bike Drives - Racing Fever
description:
Welcome to the motorcycle racing experience! Dirt Bike Rally is a must have game for all bike riders.


Bike Racing 3D is easy to pick up but hard to master which will keep you in the zone for hours. Race, jump and crash your way and other mad rivals through the amazing frontier tracks as you master the skills and the physics of motocross in this high speed racing adventure. Here is your chance to step up and prove that you are the most intense and competitive biker!

-Beat your rivals in top bike racing game
Prepare for heart-stopping and breathtaking thrills you have never seen in mobile games before.

-Ride epic bikes
There’s also a treat for all of the dirt fanatics out there - you can drive real quads. Experience speed that cannot be stopped by anything less than a brick wall!


-Express yourself
Customise your bike with unique tuning - slap some decals and paint it with your favourite color.

-Become a legend of the road
The great highway awaits for those brave enough to compete with the best racing competitors in the world of the underground bike community.


What are you waiting for, download now for free.
